lead_paragraph: Jordy Mercer hit a tiebreaking RBI double in the 12th inning, and the Pittsburgh Pirates continued their mastery of the Colorado Rockies with a 9-8 marathon win Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Mercer's Double in 12th Lifts Pirates Over Rockies 9-8
headline.main: Mercer's Double in 12th Lifts Pirates Over Rockies 9-8
